price: 34. En Wij hebben daarin tuinen van dadelpalmen en druiven gemaakt en Wij hebben ervoor gezorgd dat waterbronnen daarin stromen.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَنَّٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ وَفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡعُيُونِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā jannātin min nakhīlin wa-aʿnābin wafajjarnā fīhā mina al-ʿuyūni
translations: and We caused to gush forth
